function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spatial clusters of COVID-19 spread indicating high infection ratios in specific regions.","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread transmission and difficulty in containment of the disease in affected areas.","Mitigation":"Strict implementation of containment measures, targeted vaccination, and travel restrictions in affected regions.","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping and tracking, predictive modeling for spread analysis.","People":"Residents and travelers in affected cities, public health officials, government authorities.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government authorities, and policy makers."}]}
